comment.author: 63374052@N04
comment._content: Tail 61-0286 is actually an EC-135H... not a 'C'. This model flew Silk Purse ABNCP missions for USAFE out of Mildenhall, UK under teh 10 ACCS.. It was built as a KC-135A and converted to 'H' in 1964. Later converted to a ground trainer (no fly anymore).
